HMNZS Manawanui sinking: New Zealand, Samoan crews salvage empty shipping container from nearby reefs https://www.nzherald.co.nz/nz/hmnzs-manawanui-sinking-new-zealand-samoan-crews-salvage-empty-shipping-container-from-nearby-reefs/VVA5E3I2LFH5RKWURAQKGRJE7I/ https://www.nzherald.co.nz/nz/hmnzs-manawanui-sinking-new-zealand-samoan-crews-salvage-empty-shipping-container-from-nearby-reefs/VVA5E3I2LFH5RKWURAQKGRJE7I/ One container containing 3000kg worth of food was lost during the crash. Long-range weather outlook: Is NZ in for a rain-soaked Labour weekend? https://www.nzherald.co.nz/nz/long-range-weather-outlook-is-nz-in-for-a-rain-soaked-labour-weekend/2WH3DVWG6BEWRFJBKRD6KJMJEE/ https://www.nzherald.co.nz/nz/long-range-weather-outlook-is-nz-in-for-a-rain-soaked-labour-weekend/2WH3DVWG6BEWRFJBKRD6KJMJEE/ Jamie MortonA subtropical pulse may deliver NZ a damp end to October. Does La Nina still loom beyond? Sun, 20 Oct 2024 05:00:00 +0000 After more generally settled weather for the next two days, a northwest flow is due to arrive in the mid to late week – bringing widespread rain and a risk of severe gales for central New Zealand.

One person dead after boat capsizes on Auckland’s Manukau Harbour https://www.nzherald.co.nz/nz/emergency-services-responding-to-boating-incident-on-aucklands-manukau-harbour/Q4C72R6W3ZFJNCOHYEXUB7IKFA/ https://www.nzherald.co.nz/nz/emergency-services-responding-to-boating-incident-on-aucklands-manukau-harbour/Q4C72R6W3ZFJNCOHYEXUB7IKFA/ Two ambulances have rushed to the incident near Huia.
